typedef CSL_McbspObj* CSL_McbspHandle

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum CSL_McbspInsId

UART instance numbers.

Enumerator:
CSL_MCBSP_INST_0 

MCBSP hardware instance 0

CSL_MCBSP_INST_INVALID 

Invalid MCBSP hardware instance

enum CSL_McbspOpMode
Enumerator:
CSL_MCBSP_OPMODE_NORMAL 

MCBSP oprtaing mode

enum CSL_UartEventType

enum variable for the selection of UART interrupt Receiver Line Status Int,Transmitter Holding Register Empty Int, Receiver data available Int.

Enumerator:
CSL_UART_RECVOR_REG_DATA_INTERRUPT 

receiver reg data available interrupt

CSL_UART_XMITOR_REG_EMPTY_INTERRUPT 

Transmittor reg empty interrupt

CSL_UART_RECVOR_LINE_STATUS_INTERRUPT 

Line status interrupt interrupt

enum CSL_UartInsId

UART instance numbers.

Enumerator:
CSL_UART_INST_0 

UART hardware instance 0

CSL_UART_INST_INVALID 

Invalid UART hardware instance

enum CSL_UartOpmode

UART Device mode of transmission.

This is used at device open and to configure the UART device

Enumerator:
UART_POLLED 

UART transfer is through UART polled mode

UART_INTERRUPT 

UART transfer is through UART intr mode

UART_OPMODE_OTHER 

Undefined transfer mode

enum CSL_UartXferMode

This enum defines Xfer mode of UART.

Enumerator:
CSL_UART_FIFO_MODE 

UART in FIFO mode

CSL_UART_NON_FIFO_MODE 

UART in NON FIFO mode

CSL_UART_MODE_UNDEFINED 

Reserved values

Function Documentation

CSL_Status MCBSP_close ( CSL_McbspHandle  hMcbsp)

============================================================================


MCBSP_close

Description


Close the handle to MCBSP and stops the clock to MCBSP

Arguments 


            None

Return Value CSL_Status

  • CSL_SOK - Returned for success

CSL_ESYS_BADHANDLE - Bad handle passed

Pre Condition


MCBSP_open should be called successfully.


None

Post Condition

Example 


            Status = MCBSP_close(hMcbsp);

			if( Status != CSL_SOK )

			{

			 printf("MCBSP_close is failed\r\n");

			}

============================================================================

CSL_Status Mcbsp_Configure ( CSL_McbspHandle  hMcbsp,
CSL_McbspSetup *  mcbspSetup 
)

============================================================================


Mcbsp_Configure

Description


Configures the MCBSP CSL module

Arguments 


            CSL_McbspHandle      MCBSP Handle

			CSL_McbspSetup	 	 McBSP configuration structure

Return Value CSL_Status

  • CSL_SOK - Returned for success
  • CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS - Invalid parameter

Pre Condition


MCBSP_open should be called successfully

Post Condition


Initializes McBSP with the configuration structure

Modifies


MCBSP Object structure

Example 


            CSL_Status    status;

            status = Mcbsp_Configure(hMcbsp,&ConfigLoopBack32);

============================================================================

CSL_McbspHandle MCBSP_open ( CSL_McbspInsId  instance,
CSL_McbspObj *  McbspObj,
CSL_Status *  status 
)

============================================================================


MCBSP_open

Description


Open the handle to the McBSP CSL module

Arguments 


            instance      MCBSP Hardware instance number

            McbspObj	  MCBSP CSL object

            CSL_Status	  CSL status

Return Value CSL_Status

  • CSL_SOK - Returned for success
  • CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS - Invalid parameter

CSL_ESYS_BADHANDLE - Bad handle passed

Pre Condition


None

Post Condition


Initializes MCBSP module

Modifies


MCBSP Object structure

Example 


            CSL_McbspHandle hMcbsp;

            hMcbsp =  MCBSP_open(CSL_McbspInsId instance,

						   CSL_McbspObj *McbspObj,

						   CSL_Status 	*status)

============================================================================

CSL_Status MCBSP_start ( CSL_McbspHandle  hMcbsp,
Uint16  StartMask,
Uint32  SampleRateDelay 
)

============================================================================


MCBSP_start

Description


Close the handle to UHPI and stops the clock to UHPI

Arguments 


            CSL_McbspHandle      MCBSP Handle

			Uint16 				 StartMask

			Uint32 			     SampleRateDelay

Return Value CSL_Status

  • CSL_SOK - Returned for success

CSL_ESYS_BADHANDLE - Bad handle passed

CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS - Invalid parameter

Pre Condition


MCBSP_open should be called successfully.


None

Post Condition

Example 




            Status = MCBSP_start(hMcbsp,StartMask,SampleRateDelay);

			if( Status != CSL_SOK )

			{

			 printf("MCBSP_start is failed\r\n");

			}

============================================================================
